text:
Timothy Charles Smith (3 July 1961 – 21 July 2020) was an English singer-songwriter, multi-instrumentalist, record producer and music video director. He was best known as the frontman of the cult English band Cardiacs. He was born in Carshalton, Surrey.
In June 2008, Smith suffered from a heart attack and stroke which left him physically disabled. He died on 21 July 2020, aged 59.
